title: Spect0r
subtitle: Spect0r Development
shortDescription:
Turn your smartphone into a digital co-pilot Faster, safer, more relaxed - and all over Austria! With this app you get to your destination in record time. Spector turns your smartphone into a digital co-pilot: early traffic warning, simple operation - maximum driving pleasure! This clever assistance system comes directly from the cloud. Get your digital co-pilot for Austria!
http://spector.at/
